title: Bill White / Oneil OJ- scan added later
author: bigfish

posts.post_title: Bill White / Oneil OJ- scan added later
posts.post_content:
I am going to re post once I get my scanner working. It says Bill White is pictured instead of O Neil. I guess it's like the Tinker / Weaver tango eggs card?

It's 356 - 2 in the old judge book. The book has the Chi PL card posted. Mine is St Louis.

Hi. Dont see that particular pose listed in the Goodwin OJ Photo book. Closest is 356-7, but they are different cards though both stooping with ball. This one has stripes on hat reversed, different writing and apparently a mustache(I think, image is blurred on my screen).

I am going to re post once I get my scanner working.  It says Bill White is pictured instead of O Neil.  I guess it's like the Tinker / Weaver tango eggs card?

It's 356 - 2 in the old judge book.  The book has the Chi PL card posted.  Mine is St Louis.

Toby: The card is O'Neill and, as I told you this morning, it is a fairly common card. In the book we tried to post one image with every team that the player had a card from. The St Louis team designation is the most common, by far, team designation. The Chicago PL team designation shown in the book is very scarce.
